title: Eyes Wide Shut
plot: A Manhattan doctor embarks on a bizarre, night-long odyssey after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.

subtitles.author: DariusBellpepper

5894639 5897767 That must have been

3577212 3580249 Yes, sir.

3627893 3631761 I gotta get going. I gotta go.

4253326 4255235 I'll leave my stuff here in the back.

4285694 4288779 Thank you, sir.

4703358 4706145 I' m not sure what you

4729512 4731671 It doesn't matter who I am.

4956927 4959383 I promise to bring him right back.

4969566 4972484 I don't think you realize

4979868 4981945 Why are you telling me this?

4987168 4991332 You don't want to know.

4998139 5002386 Because it would cost me my life

5015241 5018657 Are you the gentleman

5021539 5025751 Your driver's at the front door and

5123734 5127020 May I have the password, please?

5132827 5136363 That's right, sir.

5181923 5186881 Because here, it doesn't matter

5294462 5298542 Are you sure you understand

5325621 5329619 ...or if you say a single word

5332754 5337251 ...there will be the most

5383142 5385680 What is going to happen to that woman?
5386521 5389557 No one can change her fate now.
5390483 5393105 When a promise has been made here...

5533807 5538350 I' m sorry I woke you up, but I thought

5541482 5544399 I just had such a horrible dream.
5557541 5561290 It took longer than I thought.
5620609 5623777 We were in a deserted city...

5657817 5661862 And I was angry because

5664449 5668779 You rushed away to go

5673209 5677159 As soon as you were gone,

5687933 5692596 Then I was lying

5701240 5704157 ...and a man walked out of the woods.

5708372 5712666 He was the man from the hotel,

5762724 5765049 Why don't you tell me the rest of it?

5818450 5821951 Then there were all these

5844729 5847565 ...I don't know how many I was with.

5850694 5855571 And I knew you could see me

5865794 5868500 I wanted to make fun of you...
5875972 5880930 And so I laughed as loud as I could.

5895034 5898202 That must have been
when you woke me up.
5981003 5983079 I'll just have a cup of coffee, please.

6004071 6007237 Do you know when they get in

6007449 6010865 I think there's usually someone

6033685 6037305 ...because it's important that

6043947 6047031 I don't know if he'd want me

6047242 6049615 It's okay, I' m a doctor.
6049912 6052368 I' m actually an old friend of his.

6070977 6075271 Some tests. I know he'll want to

6105180 6107387 Hi! How can I help you?

6161200 6162575 No, I' m an old friend of his.

6175883 6178800 It's funny you should

6179053 6182386 ...because there was something

6206291 6209245 They were very well-dressed

6209461 6213126 But they weren't the kind of people

6220724 6225469 ...I noticed Mr. Nightingale

6246751 6250916 When they came back, Mr. Nightingale

6261601 6264093 And then they just

6372431 6376511 That was 150 for the rental,

6391577 6394531 Would you like to say hello

6503323 6506988 Please ask Dr. Miller if he can fit

6773577 6777527 I have some appointments

6844905 6847859 ...I don't know how many I was with.

she may not even be coming back.
7097180 7100015 She may not even be coming back?

I don't know.

7144815 7147104 I don't know whether to tell you this.

7614953 7619283 One of my patients was admitted

7703384 7706005 Because it could cost me my life...

7827060 7830061 Please tell him I'll be there

7874695 7875858 How do you take it? Neat?

7892131 7895418 No, I was just

8025068 8028271 What in the hell

8080254 8085212 Then I remembered seeing you

8102736 8104729 Of course it was Nick's fault.

8111746 8114700 ...and he's made me look like

8135980 8140644 ...no idea you were involved

8173689 8175598 All right? I owe you an apology.

8178944 8182942 I know what the desk clerk told you.

8183199 8186403 ...all they did was

8186787 8190571 By now he's probably back

8194378 8197628 The clerk said

8199717 8202884 Okay, he had a bruise on his face.

8203972 8206926 That's a hell of a lot less

8207767 8211896 I don't think you realize what

8218446 8221780 If I told you their names...

8221991 8225740 ...but if I did,

8232879 8234622 Is that what gave me away?
8241095 8243421 But not because you didn't know it.

8305457 8307201 Do you know who she was?

8540631 8544130 You called it a fake, a charade.

8545761 8549130 Do you mind telling me

8559151 8563778 Okay, Bill, let's cut the bullshit.

8563989 8566778 You've been way out of your depth

8567035 8570487 You want to know what kind of charade?

8571748 8575413 That whole play-acted,

8575627 8580206 ...that you've been jerking off with

8580424 8584043 Nothing happened after you left

8595690 8599392 She was a junkie. She OD'd.

8599612 8603824 Her door was locked from the inside.

8605201 8610159 Come on. It was always gonna be

8637695 8640364 Someone died. It happens all the time.
8649333 8651207 But you know that, don't you?

8937064 8941358 She's expecting us to

8967472 8970045 I could put Sabrina in here.

8986034 8989450 I hope Santa Claus gets me

8993249 8995409 Well, you' re gonna
have to wait and see.
9009602 9011641 What do you think we should do?
9016817 9018276 What do I think we should do?

9029164 9031834 What do I think?
I don't know.

9062492 9067487 ...that we've managed to
survive through all of our...
9112088 9113831 Only as sure as I am...
9119221 9122056 ...let alone that of a whole lifetime...
9177535 9181153 Let's not use that word. You know?

9206190 9208896 ...that we need
to do as soon as possible.
